s9.message: Background images are marked as such in the sidebar now

s8.message: Blocked parent links are displayed as a serapate item in the sidebar now

s3.message: Fixed: Sidebar isn't updated when going to a page without blockable items

s2.message: Fixed: Selection doesn't show up on newly added filters

s1.message: Fixed: OK button in Preferences stops working when using multiple browser windows

s10.message: Made columns in Preferences match the sidebar

s7.message: Middle-click on "Adblock" in the status bar enables/disables Adblock Plus

s6.message: Displaying "no blockable items" instead of "not a remote webpage" for about:blank (blank page) now

s5.message: Double-click on a blocked item in the sidebar selects the corresponding filter in the preferences dialog

s4.message: Tooltip in sidebar now shows the filter in effect

s12.message: Preset filter examples changed (word "banner" might give too many false positives)

s11.message: Added option to cancel the warning when importing filters
